title: What are some of the best universities for Law studies (undergraduate) in Pakistan? - Quora

response.answer_text: 1 - LUMS, Shaikh Ahmad Hassan School of Law: Shaikh Ahmad Hassan School of Law is constituent law school of LUMS, located in Lahore. LUMS started BA-LL.B programme in early 2000s. It is one of the top quality educational institute in terms of faculty, environment and resources. 2 - Punjab University Law College, Lahore: Pu Law college is the oldest institute in the country providing legal education since 1868. Most of the top class lawyers and judges in Pakistan are alumni of this college. 3 - Quaid-e-Azam law College, Lahore: This college has been providing legal education since 1987. It is one of the first private sector legal educational institution. It also has top class faculty.
